history.post: BAD NEWS: I’m told that this presentation is not going to be recorded. Any school, even in Kansas, can record a presentation and put it up on You Tube. I have tried to contact Dr. Schauf but his email address seems to be a big secret. Since this is a press release, write to Ken Arnold, the school’s director of communications. He should be able to pass on an email to Dr. Schauf. Ken’s email is Arnold K@newmanu.edu.
